name: Follow the Thin Line - Move the Dot with Your Finger
name_original: Follow the Thin Line - Move the Dot with Your Finger
description:
Follow the Thin Line brings a new level of challenge and excitement to the line game genre.

Follow the line as long as you can to get the high score and beat your friends. This is no easy task however, as it requires crazy focus and mad skills!

Features
- Hours of line following fun
- Highly addictive
- Super Challenging
- Unlimited game-play
- Beautiful design
- Gamecenter

More Apps
- Flaming Ferret
- Line Soccer
- Tap Tip
- Tax Me
- Budget Saved
- Math Game
